entries.help_slots: Ship Component Slots  The list of slots available for ship components on a ship.
entries.help_hitpoints: Low Hitpoints  This icon marks that the ship component loaded in the indicated slot has less then 25% of its maximum hitpoint value.
entries.help_unpowered: Unpowered  This icon marks that the ship component loaded in the indicated slot is not receiving enough power to operate. This usually means the ship's main reactor is not functioning at a high enough level.
entries.help_disabled: Disabled  This icon marks that the ship component loaded in the indicated slot is disabled.
entries.help_shipinfo: General Starship Information  This is general information about your starship.
entries.help_component_detail: Ship Component Details  This shows details for the selected ship component in the ship component slot list.
entries.help_value_bar: Ship Component Hitpoint Bar  This shows the ship component's current hitpoint value.
